io.lettuce.core.resource

接口 DnsResolver

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DirContextDnsResolver, DnsResolvers

    public interface DnsResolver
    Users may implement this interface to override the normal DNS lookup offered by the OS.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.2

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      InetAddress[] resolve(String host)
      Returns the IP address for the specified host name.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        InetAddress[] resolve(String host)
               throws UnknownHostException
        Returns the IP address for the specified host name.
        参数:
        host - the hostname, must not be empty or null.
        返回:
        array of one or more adresses. An empty array indicates that DNS resolution is not supported by this DnsResolver and should happen by netty, see InetSocketAddress.createUnresolved(String, int).
        抛出:
        UnknownHostException - if the given host is not recognized or the associated IP address cannot be used to build an InetAddress instance
